channel.title: Devleader.ca on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Devleader.ca on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Abstract Factory Pattern Real-World Example in C#: Complete Implementation
item.description: See Abstract Factory pattern in action with a complete real-world C# example. Step-by-step implementation of a furniture shop system demonstrating families of related objects. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2026/02/12/abstract-factory-pattern-realworld-example-in-c-complete-implementation

item.title: The Syringe Class: Needlr's Fluent API Explained
item.description: Deep dive into Needlr's Syringe class and its fluent API for configuring dependency injection, discovery strategies, and type registration in C#. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2026/02/11/the-syringe-class-needlrs-fluent-api-explained

item.title: When to Use Abstract Factory Pattern in C#: Decision Guide with Examples
item.description: Learn when to use Abstract Factory pattern in C# with clear decision criteria, code examples, and scenarios. Understand the signs that indicate Abstract Factory is the right choice. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2026/02/10/when-to-use-abstract-factory-pattern-in-c-decision-guide-with-examples

item.title: Automatic Service Discovery in C# with Needlr: How It Works
item.description: Learn how Needlr's automatic service discovery works in C# with convention-based registration, type scanning, and the DoNotAutoRegister attribute for .NET applications. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2026/02/09/automatic-service-discovery-in-c-with-needlr-how-it-works

item.title: Over Optimism of Rewrites in Software Engineering - Dev Leader Weekly 126
item.description: Welcome to another issue of Dev Leader Weekly! In this issue, I discuss rewrites, refactors, and the constant inaccurate optimism as developers. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2026/02/08/over-optimism-of-rewrites-in-software-engineering-dev-leader-weekly-126

item.title: Weekly Recap - 2026-02-08
item.description: Check out this week from Dev Leader! Here's a list including articles and videos on software engineering, career development, and programming in C#! Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2026/02/08/weekly-recap-20260208

item.title: Abstract Factory vs Factory Method Pattern in C#: Key Differences Explained
item.description: Understand the differences between Abstract Factory and Factory Method patterns in C# with code examples, use cases, and guidance on when to use each pattern. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2026/02/08/abstract-factory-vs-factory-method-pattern-in-c-key-differences-explained

item.title: Source Generation vs Reflection in Needlr: Choosing the Right Approach
item.description: Compare Needlr's source generation and reflection strategies for dependency injection in C# to choose the right approach for AOT, performance, and flexibility. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2026/02/07/source-generation-vs-reflection-in-needlr-choosing-the-right-approach

item.title: Abstract Factory Design Pattern in C#: Complete Guide with Examples
item.description: Master the Abstract Factory design pattern in C# with complete code examples, real-world scenarios, and practical implementation guidance for creating families of related objects. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2026/02/06/abstract-factory-design-pattern-in-c-complete-guide-with-examples

item.title: Getting Started with Needlr: Fluent DI for .NET Applications
item.description: Learn how to install and configure Needlr for dependency injection in .NET with step-by-step setup, NuGet packages, and your first fluent DI application. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2026/02/05/getting-started-with-needlr-fluent-di-for-net-applications
